sentences.en: A handful of common sense is worth bushel of learning.
sentences.cn: 一点小常识常胜过很多有价值的学问.

sentences.en: A handful of good life is better than a bushel of learning.
sentences.cn: 一把好日子胜过一蒲式耳的学问.

sentences.en: Corn in Chicago has jumped 45 percent this year and traded at $6.035 a bushel today, while wheat has gained 41 percent and soybeans have rallied 27 percent.
sentences.cn: 在芝加哥，今年的玉米价格已经涨了45%到6.035美元一蒲式耳（体积单位），而小麦和大豆价格分别上涨了：41%和27%。

sentences.en: Corn was an average of 2 dollars a bushel last year.
sentences.cn: 去年大豆的价格平均为每蒲式耳两美元.

sentences.en: Corn was an average of two a bushel last year.
sentences.cn: 去年谷物平均每蒲式尔两美元.

sentences.en: Corn was an average of two dollars a bushel last year.
sentences.cn: 去年每普式尔玉米的平均价格为两美元.

sentences.en: Gentry sent to market will not buy one bushel of corn.
sentences.cn: 门第再高贵,一斗谷子也难兑.

sentences.en: Grains are sold by the bushel.
He liked also being seen and being congratulated on growing up such a fine looking and fortunate young fellow , for he was not the youth to hide his light under a bushel.
sentences.cn: 他也喜欢人家看到他,称赞他的漂亮和好运, 因为他不是那种谦逊不好表现的年轻人.

sentences.en: He may well measure your corn by his bushel.
sentences.cn: 他很可能以小人之心度君子之腹.

sentences.en: He must not measure his neighbour's corn by his own bushel.
sentences.cn: 他不应该拿自己的标准去衡量邻居.

sentences.en: John, don't hide your light under a bushel. Let the world see what you can do.
sentences.cn: 约翰, 不要过于谦虚. 让大家知道你的才能吧.

sentences.en: She bought a bushel of apples from the farmer.
sentences.cn: 她从农民那里买来一蒲式耳的苹果.

sentences.en: They are offering farmers $2.15 a bushel for corn.
sentences.cn: 他们向农民出价每蒲式耳2.15美元收购玉米。

sentences.en: Thus, hiding the lamp under the bushel indicates anxiety concerning our living.
sentences.cn: 因此, 把灯藏在斗底下,指明为生活忧虑.

sentences.en: We have a bushel of things to do today.
sentences.cn: 今天我们有许多事情要做.

sentences.en: Wheat averages 56 pounds to a bushel.
sentences.cn: 小麦平均 56 磅为一蒲式耳。

sentences.en: Where i come from, people like me come by the bushel.
sentences.cn: 在我们那里像我这样的人车载斗量,不可胜数.

phrases.phrase: hide one's light under a bushel

trans.tran_cn: 蒲式耳（在美国相当于2150。42立方英寸，或35。42升），大量，许多，一蒲式耳重量的容器
trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring grain and fruit (equal in volume to 8 gallons)
